column4: it has two nics, the broadcome which is 10/100 ethernet and intel centrino technology which is 802.11b. Form the look of it, the broadcom *should* work but (due to naff support from intel) the centrino part of things wont
There's my pet Labrador too, he'll sniff anything
'k, is there any way of submitting an installation report so guys at ubuntu can see what works or not? Or do I just have to post an email somewhere (where?)
